definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: You can describe all of these formats with regular expressions.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些格式都可以用正則表達式來描述。

sentences.english: This pattern object represents the regular expression that is defined in text format.
sentences.chinese: 該模式對象代表以文本格式定義的正則表達式。

sentences.english: Differentiating between greediness and laziness is key to fully understanding advanced regular expressions.
sentences.chinese: 理解貪婪與懶惰的區別是運用高級正則表達式的基礎。

sentences.english: Whitespace in the regular expression that isn't inside a character class is ignored.
sentences.chinese: 在正則表達式中不在字符類中的空白符被忽略。

sentences.english: To achieve this in the above example, you use a regular expression to perform the replacement.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，上例中使用正則表達式進行替換。
兩行都使用了正則表達式。

sentences.english: Can DFA regex engines handle atomic groups?
sentences.chinese: DFA的正則表達式引擎可以處理原子團？

sentences.english: Each regex is represented by a match element.
sentences.chinese: 每個正則表達式都由一個匹配元素表示。

sentences.english: You can also use regular expression-like groups to match files.
sentences.chinese: 您還可以使用類似於正則表達式的組來匹配文件。

sentences.english: Wht is wrong with my regex?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是我的正則表達式是錯誤的？

sentences.english: An Extended Stored Procedure to use regular expressions in T-SQL.
sentences.chinese: 一個使用正則表達式的存儲過程。

sentences.english: This saves you the trouble of having to re-type the regular expression every time.
sentences.chinese: 這樣您就不必每次都要重新鍵入正則表達式。

sentences.english: This allows hexadecimal values in regular expressions when parsing.
sentences.chinese: 這允許在解析時在正則表達式中使用十六進制值。

sentences.english: Parentheses in a regular expression are used to create a subexpression.
sentences.chinese: 正則表達式中的括號用於創建子表達式。

sentences.english: When used with care, regexes are very fast.
sentences.chinese: 小心使用它，正則表達式是非常快的。

sentences.english: Re-enter the search string using the correct regular expression syntax.
sentences.chinese: 使用正確的正則表達式語法重新輸入搜索字符串。
